content: sweet paprika designs pizzicato pinstripe socks designed by elizabeth sullivan skill level skill level pattern and photos © sweet paprika designs 2018 www sweetpaprikadesigns com pizzicato pinstripe socks skill level repeat these two row 14 more times or until heel flap measures intermediate 2¼ ending with a rs row size turn heel woman s medium row 1 ws sl 1 p17 p2tog p1 turn row 2 rs sl 1 k6 ssk k1 turn finished measurements row 3 sl 1 p7 p2tog p1 turn leg circumference 7½ row 4 sl 1 k8 ssk k1 turn continue to decrease in the same manner working 1 st more foot circumference 7¼ before decrease each row until all sts have been worked and 19 sts foot length 9 or desired length remain ending with a rs row do not turn yarn gusset fingering weight yarn 285 yds with rs facing using 1st dpn with the 19 heel sts pick up and knit 15 sts along side of heel slip the 29 instep sts back onto one shown in sweet paprika pizzicato 80% superwash blue-faced needle with 2nd dpn work round 1 of pinstripe pattern across 29 leicester wool 20% nylon 115g/412 yds 1 skein palestra instep sts with 3rd dpn pick up and knit 15 sts along other side of heel then knit 9 heel sts from 1st dpn there are 78 sts in the needles round 25 sts on 1st dpn 29 sts on 2nd dpn and 24 sts on 3rd dpn size 2 2 75mm set of 4 dpns or size needed to obtain gauge and the beginning of round is now at centre of heel notions shape gusset as follows yarn needle round 1 1st dpn knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 2nd dpn work in patttern 3rd dpn k1 ssk knit to end of round 2 sts decrease gauge round 2 1st dpn knit 2nd dpn work in pattern 3rd dpn knit 16 sts and 24 rnds = 2 in pinstripe pattern worked in the round repeat these two rnds until 58 sts rem 15 sts on 1st dpn 29 sts on 2nd dpn and 14 sts on 3rd dpn pattern notes all slipped stitches are slipped purlwise with the yarn at the ws foot of the work unless otherwise stated continue working 1st and 3rd dpns in st st and 2nd dpn in pinstripe pattern until foot measures 7½ or 1½ less than the twisted rib multiple of 3 sts desired length ending with round 1 of pattern all rnds * p2 k1 tbl repeat from * to end of round toe pinstripe pattern multiple of 6 sts round 1 1st dpn knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 2nd dpn k1 ssk work round 1 knit in pattern to last 3 sts k2tog k1 3rd dpn k1 ssk knit to end 4 round 2 k2 * sl 1 k5 repeat from * to last 4 sts sl 1 k3 sts decrease repeat rnds 1-2 for pattern round
